title: I have a privacy-first mindset
text: I work with privacy-by-design, end-to-end encryption and data minimisation to avoid data becoming a risk. Data is currently the most valuable resource and should be treated as such.

title: I am a software engineer
text: I write and review code in C, C++, Rust, C#, Python, Java, JavaScript, TypeScript, PHP and several more languages.

title: I have been a teaching and mentoring
text: I have taught Operating Systems and C to hundreds of students at the IT University of Copenhagen, which showcases my ability to present complex topics clearly.

title: I have been an entrepreneur
text: Running my own company taught me how to turn technology into business value as well as setting strategic direction and realistic goals.

title: I have done academic research
text: My PhD trained me in academic research and following the scientific method. I have presented at international conferences and workshops.

title: I have practical experience with hardware
text: I have hands-on experience with data centres, including installing and maintaining servers, storage and network equipment.
